thread.title: John Bercow launches indirect attack on China as Queen meets President Xi Jinping
thread.title_full: John Bercow launches indirect attack on China as Queen meets President Xi Jinping

author: Michael Wilkinson
title: John Bercow launches indirect attack on China as Queen meets President Xi Jinping
text: Politics John Bercow launches indirect attack on China as Queen meets President Xi Jinping House of Commons Speaker John Bercow compares China to the 'great democracy' of India as the Queen greets President Xi Jinping John Bercow, the Commons Speaker Photo: PA By Michael Wilkinson , Political Correspondent 1:02PM BST 20 Oct 2015
